name: Bunny with a chainsaw
description:
Caution - does not actually have anything to do with bunnies or chainsaws!

A top down shooter with a twist - none of your weapons can damage the enemies. Dodge the bullets of your enemies and use your pulse mines to knock them into the conveniently placed holes. 

The shield doesn't shield you from the enemies and your blaster doesn't hurt them - good look!

Made by LittleManInc.
